page.title: 08Local Pilning Attitudes
page.content: People are all very interested in preserving our heritage and take an active interest in the subject. Many grow plants known to be attractive to wildlife. People are very conscious of the threat of Severnside and listen to reports on monitoring the pollution. They are interested in the idea that the sum of pollution from all the works may be dangerous while each one on its own is not. In a rural area like this people are concerned about the loss of amenities which will reduce living standards. They wish to keep the village school, station,post office and bus services.
